MeDonate: All funds raised will go towards the next game development!
MeIntro: Good day! ^ As you can see, I'm hunkered up here in the corner, making video games little by little. But as you've heard, development is getting more expensive, so I had to start a crowdfunding campaign. Fifty bucks would really help me out.
MeThanks: Thanks for the donation! ^ It's time to get to work!
